rows.label: tlk70000034_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh you tender-hearted souls, I thank
you from the depths of my being!

rows.label: tlk70000034_04_msg0002
rows.name:
With "Sweet Nothings", I can finally
express the breadth of my love for
sweet Sarah!

rows.label: tlk70000034_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Just imagining her smiling face makes
my fingers fly over the strings of my
lute! Oh Sarah, my muse...

rows.label: tlk70000034_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Though I'm afraid all this fuss over
her has made Azzaro upset with me
again...
